alert.note: Alert for Labette; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:14AM CDT until May 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River at Oswego affecting Cherokee and Labette Counties. Neosho River near Erie affecting Neosho County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River near Parsons affecting Neosho and Labette Counties. For the Neosho River...including Iola, Chanute, Erie, Parsons, Oswego...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Parsons. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:01 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 25.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 9.4 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Neosho River Parsons 21.0 25.6 Sat 8 am CDT 21.0 13.3 10.6 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
